title: Canon VIXIA HF G50 4K Camcorder with 20x Optical Zoom
description: The Canon VIXIA HF G50 4K Camcorder with 20x Optical Zoom is a versatile and high-performance camcorder ideal for capturing detailed, high-resolution videos. This camcorder features a 1/2.3-inch CMOS sensor and the DIGIC DV 6 image processor to deliver 4K Ultra HD video at 30p resolution, with a 20x optical zoom lens that covers a focal length range of 29.3 to 601.2mm (35mm equivalent). The 3.0-inch LCD touchscreen allows for easy navigation of the camera’s settings and options, while the dual SD card slots offer extended recording capabilities. The VIXIA HF G50 supports various recording modes including MP4 and AVCHD, and includes built-in Wi-Fi for quick file sharing and remote control features. Advanced features like image stabilization and slow-motion recording enhance the camcorder’s usability for both casual and professional videography.
key_features: Dual SD card slots for extended recording
Built-in Wi-Fi for file sharing and remote control
meta_title: Canon VIXIA HF G50 4K Camcorder with 20x Optical Zoom
meta_description: Get the Canon VIXIA HF G50 4K Camcorder with 20x Optical Zoom. Features 4K Ultra HD recording, 1/2.3-inch CMOS sensor, dual SD card slots, and built-in Wi-Fi.

title: Canon VIXIA HF G50 4K Camcorder with 20x Optical Zoom & Dual SD Card Slots
description: The Canon VIXIA HF G50 4K Camcorder with 20x Optical Zoom and Dual SD Card Slots offers exceptional video quality and advanced features for both professional and personal videography. This camcorder is equipped with a 1/2.3-inch CMOS sensor and DIGIC DV 6 image processor, providing stunning 4K Ultra HD video recording at 30p resolution. The 20x optical zoom lens ensures you can capture a wide range of scenes, from expansive landscapes to distant subjects. The 3.0-inch LCD touchscreen facilitates easy access to the camera’s settings and features, and the dual SD card slots allow for extended recording times and easy file management. Additional features include built-in Wi-Fi for convenient file sharing and remote control, image stabilization for smooth video capture, and slow-motion recording for creative effects. Perfect for a variety of video projects, the VIXIA HF G50 delivers professional-level performance in a compact package.
key_features: Dual SD card slots for extended recording
Built-in Wi-Fi for file sharing and remote control
